channel.title: Run Server and compile not working?!
channel.description:
when i hit run client.bat it comes up
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue...
Can some1 plz help me fix this????
And when i hit compile it comes up
' javac' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operavle program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
also need help with that

item.title: Run Server and compile not working?!
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

unkn0wn 0wna:

just use the compile one go to compile and hit run not compile itll work its what i used to do

That would only work if he had the perfect compiler.

Do you have jdk 6.0? Is this your first time making a server? If so, did you edit all of your enviromental variables?
